text: Troy University is a public university in Troy, Alabama. The university has about 30,000 students. It was founded in 1887. The current chancellor of the university is Jack Hawkins, Jr. ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university are called the Trojans. They have 18 varsity teams and they compete in the Sun Belt Conference. ==Other websites== * Troy University's Official website * Troy Trojans' Official athletics website Category:Sun Belt Conference Category:Colleges and universities in Alabama Category:1887 establishments in the United States Category:1880s establishments in Alabama
title: Troy University
